bibl.title: Mêchanai (Waterwheels) in the Roman Fayyum.
bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. Types of waterwheel [tabut and saqia]. - 3. Waterwheels in the Heroninos archive. - 3 [sic]. Conclusions.

bibl.title: New Archaeological and Papyrological Researches on the Fayyum. Proceedings of the International Meeting of Egyptology and Papyrology, Lecce, June 8th-10th, 2005

bibl.seg: RATHBONE Dominic W., Mêchanai (Waterwheels) in the Roman Fayyum.

Mario CAPASSO and Paola DAVOLI (Edd.), New Archaeological and Papyrological Researches on the Fayyum. Proceedings of the International Meeting of Egyptology and Papyrology, Lecce, June 8th-10th, 2005 = Papyrologica Lupiensia. 14/2005 (Galatina, 2007) pp. 251-262, 1 fig.
1. Introduction. - 2. Types of waterwheel [tabut and saqia]. - 3. Waterwheels in the Heroninos archive. - 3 [sic]. Conclusions.
